Summary Note:
The RM met Koch Müller Hoffmann at a yacht party in Helsinki. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Koch Müller Hoffmann is a 68 year old retired Startup Founder from Finland.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Koch Müller Hoffmann is currently divorced. He has 2 kids called Koch and Elisabeth.
Education Background:
Koch earned his secondary school diploma from Wilhelm-von-Humboldt-Gymnasium Berlin in 1975.
Koch completed his university education at Technical University of Munich in 1979.
In 1985, he received extra education and graduated from Heidelberg University of Education with an additional degree.
Occupation History:
Koch Müller Hoffmann is a 68 year old retired Startup Founder from Finland. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Koch Müller Hoffmann began his professional journey as a Software Developer at Rovio Entertainment Oy in 1980, laying the foundation for future success.
In 1985, he moved to Rovio Entertainment Oy to work as a Startup Founder, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 820000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Hämeenlinna and Düsseldorf, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Koch as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
